Title: Provides for the payment of retirement benefits to certain members of the New York state employees retirement system
Summary: Provides for the payment of retirement benefits to members of the New York state employees retirement system who reentered service after retiring before January 1, 1980, pursuant to chapter 666 of the laws of 1990.
ActClause: AN ACT to provide for the payment of retirement benefits to certain members of the New York state employees' retirement system who reentered public service pursuant to chapter 666 of the laws of 1990
